about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a thrilling 3D third-person combat experience, where every battle is a test of your strategy and reflexes. Dive into an ever-evolving world of intense action, unique weapon styles, and a journey that rewards adaptability and skill.

Fluid and Engaging Combat

  • Master a variety of combat styles, each tied to distinct weapons. Discover powerful combos and upgrade your abilities as you progress.

Strategic Progression

  • Tailor your playstyle by enhancing your character’s strengths. Adapt to new challenges and unlock advanced techniques to dominate the battlefield.

Wave-Based Action

  • Face relentless waves of enemies with increasing difficulty. Every encounter offers a fresh challenge, pushing you to refine your combat strategy.

Cinematic Experience

  • Enjoy smooth animations, responsive controls, and a visually immersive environment that pulls you deeper into the action.

Customization

  • Personalize your character’s appearance and enhance your abilities to match your unique playstyle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
